# Download data from github {.unnumbered}

1.  Go to [https://download-directory.github.io](https://download-directory.github.io)

<img src="./img/download1.png" width="70%"/>

2. Go to the folder you need for your Lab. For example copy: [https://github.com/pietrostefani/gds/tree/main/data/London](https://github.com/pietrostefani/gds/tree/main/data/London)

<img src="./img/download2.png" width="60%"/>

3. Paste it in the green box... give it a few minutes

4. Check your downloads file and unzip

<img src="./img/download3.png" width="60%"/>
